00014 PositionRecon::PositionRecon() :
00015   BaseModule(GetDefaultName(), "Calculate the x,y,z position of an event")
00016 {
00017   AddDependency<PulseFinder>();
00018   AddDependency<S1S2Evaluation>();
00019   
00020   RegisterParameter("drift_speed", drift_speed = 1,
00021                     "Electron drift speed in mm/microsec");
00022   RegisterParameter("use_full_s2", use_full_s2 = true,
00023                     "Use the s2_full variable (true) or s2_fixed (false) to evaluate the barycenter");
00024   RegisterParameter("enable_full_recon",enable_full_recon = true,
00025                     "Enable the full (slow) position recon");
00026   RegisterParameter("calib_file",calib_file="auxiliary_files/ds10_recon_calib.txt",
00027                     "File containing calibration data for full recon");
00028   RegisterParameter("use_pmt_efficiency",use_pmt_efficiency=false,
00029                     "Take into account measured QE of PMTs?");
00030 }

00032 int PositionRecon::Initialize()
00033 {
00034   
00035   if(enable_full_recon)
00036     return LoadCalibration();
00037 
00038   return 0;
00039 }

00046 int PositionRecon::LoadCalibration()
00047 {
00048   std::ifstream fin(calib_file.c_str());
00049   if(!fin.is_open()){
00050     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to open position calibration file "
00051                   <<calib_file<<".\n";
00052     return 1;
00053   }
00054   
00055   _calib_points.clear();
00056   std::string line;
00057   while(std::getline(fin,line)){
00058     std::stringstream s(line);
00059     double val;
00060     std::vector<double> vals;
00061     while(s>>val)
00062       vals.push_back(val);
00063     //make sure we're actually within the fiducial volume...
00064     if( sqrt(vals[0]*vals[0]+vals[1]*vals[1]) <= 8.25*2.54/2. )
00065       _calib_points.push_back(vals);
00066   }
00067   Message(DEBUG)<<"Loaded "<<_calib_points.size()<<" calibration points.\n";
00068   if(_calib_points.size() == 0)
00069     return 1;
00070   
00071   //make sure we have the right number of PMTs
00072   /*
00073     size_t ns2 = 0;
00074   for(std::map<int,PMT>::iterator it = _pmts.begin(); it != _pmts.end(); ++it){
00075     if(it->second.use_for_s2)
00076       ns2++;
00077   }
00078   if( ns2 != _calib_points[0].size()-2){
00079     Message(ERROR)<<"Position calibration file does not contain the right "
00080                   <<"number of channels! Expect "<<ns2<<"; got "
00081                   <<_calib_points[0].size()-2<<"!\n";
00082     return 1;
00083   }
00084   */
00085   return 0;  
00086 }
00087 
00088 int PositionRecon::Process(EventPtr evt)
00089 {
00090   EventDataPtr data = evt->GetEventData();
00091   data->position_valid = false;
00092   if (!data->pulses_aligned && data->channels.size() > 1)
00093       return 0;
00094   if(!data->s1s2_valid){
00095     //can't do anything
00096     return 0;
00097   }
00098   //z = 0 is the bottom of the active volume
00099   data->z = 24.1 - data->drift_time*drift_speed/10.; //speed mm/us, need cm
00100   
00101   /*********** Barycenter ************/
00102   //x, y are the weighted averages of top pmts
00103   double x=0, y=0, total=0;
00104   std::vector<double> recons2; //< for calibrated recon
00105   for(size_t i=0; i < data->channels.size(); i++)
00106   {
00107       ChannelData& chdata = data->channels[i];
00108       int id = chdata.channel_id;
00109       if(id < 0 || _skip_channels.find(chdata.channel_id) != _skip_channels.end())
00110           continue;
00111       
00112     if(chdata.pmt.photocathode_z > 0)
00113     {
00114         double s2 = (use_full_s2 ? chdata.s2_full : chdata.s2_fixed);
00115         double escaled = s2/(chdata.pmt.photocathode_exp_area * chdata.pmt.qe);
00116         double s2use = (use_pmt_efficiency ? escaled : s2);
00117         recons2.push_back(s2use);
00118         x += chdata.pmt.photocathode_x * s2use;
00119         y += chdata.pmt.photocathode_y * s2use;
00120         total += s2use;
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   if(total > 0){
00125     data->bary_x = x/total;
00126     data->bary_y = y/total;
00127     data->bary_valid = true;
00128   }
00129     
00130   /************* Full recon *****************/
00131   std::vector<double> frac(recons2.size());
00132   std::vector<double> err(recons2.size());
00133   for(size_t i=0; i<recons2.size(); ++i){
00134     frac[i] = recons2[i]/total;
00135     err[i] = sqrt(recons2[i])/total;
00136   }
00137                            
00138   if(enable_full_recon && data->bary_valid){
00139       data->position_valid = true;
00140     //find the minimum chi2 on all calib points
00141     double minchi2=1.e12;
00142     for(size_t pt=0; pt<_calib_points.size(); ++pt){
00143       double chi2=0;
00144       for(size_t ch=0; ch<recons2.size(); ++ch){
00145         double val = _calib_points[pt][2+ch];
00146         chi2 += (frac[ch]-val)*(frac[ch]-val)/(err[ch]*err[ch]);
00147       }
00148       if(chi2<minchi2){
00149         minchi2 = chi2;
00150         data->x = _calib_points[pt][0];
00151         data->y = _calib_points[pt][1];
00152       }
00153     }
00154   }
00155     
00156   return 0;
00157 }
